document.full_text: a wisconsin man who allegedly planned to shoot a doctor at a madison abortion clinic was charged on friday under a federal law that allows freedom of access to the clinics, prosecutors said.
document.title: wisconsin man charged with plan to attack abortion clinic
lines_and_colors: a wisconsin man who allegedly planned to shoot a doctor at a madison abortion clinic was charged on friday under a federal law that allows freedom of access to the clinics, prosecutors said.
